This content is valuable, but I really don't know where it belongs. It seems out of place here. Article should say what EO IS, not what it is not, at least at 1st. Seems crowded, distracting
/* Russian Orthodox Church under Communist rule */
This might be clearer for formatting, rather than interrupting with the note. In fact, the note probably belongs somehwere else anywhere. But where?
Needs more neutral POV and wording a little more encyclopedic.
